title: Economic Development
description: Introduces models of economic growth and sustainable development with a focus on inequality and poverty in the national and global context.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECON 2100 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECON 2106 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECON 2101 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
